item.description: You donâ€™t have to own an English Castle like Downton Abbey to need financial and estate planning. "Estate" Planning is really "Life Planning." In this discussion you will learn how to care for your family (and pets!) now and in the future. Learn about financial planning, creating a living will or trust, power of attorney, creating a health care proxy, and more. Our guest speakers will be Attorney Richard Bergerr of Berkent Legal Services and Scott Cohen of New York Life.
item.name: Discussion:Life and Financial Planning
